definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִטְמִינוּ]] we are stopped up, stupid Job 18:3 so Thes MV Di De Zö (Aram. [[טַמֵּם]], [[טַמְטֵם]] stop up (e.g. of ear or heart), t.amem, etc., and deriv.; Ar. t.am=a fill or choke up); Vulgate Ew Hgst AV RV Da SS take it as metaplastic for [[נִטְמֵאנוּ]] we are regarded as unclean, see Ew:§ 198 b Kö:i, 614; LXX rds. [[נִדְמִינוּ]] sesiwph/kamen; Targum [[טְמַעֲנָא]].
